section1.introduce1: Connects Blockchain Ecosystem Centered on North America
section1.introduce2:
Join us in building a decentralized future and experience
the many benefits of being a part of the Zodiac Lumen ecosystem.

section2.card2Title:
Local Goods
from US and
Canada

feature1.mainDesc: Our local company, Zodiac Lumen Holdings, is dedicated to providing a reliable supply of Lumens for lottery purchases. With our services, you can rest assured that your investments are secure and trustworthy. We offer maximum convenience and the potential to win a whopping 70 million dollars in prize money.

feature2.mainTitle:
Wholesale Prices for Local Goods
from US and Canada
feature2.mainDesc:
Zodiac Lumen has established a prime partnership with Amazon USA, which means you can access a wide range of local goods at wholesale prices.
Our collaboration with one of the biggest retailers in the world allows us to bring you the best deals and discounts on a diverse range of products.
Whether you're looking for clothing, electronics, or household items, you'll be able to enjoy unbeatable prices with Zodiac Lumen.

feature3.mainDesc:
Our partnership with the US online casino Steak brings you a dynamic and thrilling gaming experience.
With a wide selection of games to choose from, you'll be able to enjoy hours of entertainment from the comfort of your own home.
Whether you're a seasoned gambler or just looking to try something new, our online casino offers something for everyone.
feature3.card1Desc:
Partnered with
US online casino
Streak

feature4.mainDesc:
Our collaboration with MasterCard in Singapore allows you to use Lumen cards anywhere in the world where MasterCard is accepted.
This gives you the freedom and flexibility to make purchases at millions of merchants globally. Plus, you can also use your Lumen card
to purchase products offered by Amazon in the Americas, making your online shopping experience even more seamless and convenient.

feature5.mainTitle:
Real Estate Investment
Opportunities through
NFT and STO Securities
feature5.mainDesc:
Zodiac Lumen is taking real estate investment to the next level. Our platform offers block deal investment opportunities
in Canada through the issuance of STO securities and NFTs. Not only do our investment opportunities offer returns on investment shares,
but we also provide work permit and immigration services to our investors.

feature6.mainDesc:
Zodiac Lumen is headquartered in the United States and Canada, with the latter serving as the main corporation.
Our focus on North America is a strategic move aimed at maximizing the usability of our cryptocurrency and providing users
with easy access to our services. Join us in building a decentralized future and be a part of our vision of connecting the world through blockchain technology.

footer.desc:
As a North American-based company, our goal is to maximize the usability of our cryptocurrency and make it accessible to users in the region and beyond.
By focusing on North America, we aim to make the use of Lumens
as effortless and user-friendly as possible.
